response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value to us at $15,000. Considering its immense worth and the unique opportunity it presents, I would like to offer it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate quality and exclusivity. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 12000}
